## Featured Publications


```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)

#load tidied publication data
pub.df<-read.csv("../data/mergedPubList_manual.csv") 
pub.df<-pub.df %>%
  arrange(desc(year))

doi.list<-c("10.1038/s41598-020-66563-z",
            "10.1016/j.buildenv.2021.107928")

for (doi.ind in 1:length(doi.list)) {
  each<-which(pub.df$doi==doi.list[doi.ind])
  
  cat(paste0("::: grid \n", #grid-1
           "::: {.g-col-10 .vh-left .just-text} \n", #g-col-10-1
           pub.df$authors[each],
           ", \"",pub.df$title[each], "\", *",
           pub.df$journalShort[each], "*, ",
           pub.df$year[each], ". ",
           "[{{< ai doi-square title=\"DOI\" >}}](https://doi.org/",pub.df$doi[each], ")",
           "{style=\"font-size:1.5em\"}  "))

 #if RG link available
  if (!is.na(pub.df$rg[each])){
    cat(paste0("[{{< ai researchgate-square title=\"ResearchGate\" >}}](", pub.df$rg[each],")",
             "{style=\"font-size:1.5em\"}  "))
  }
  
  #if arxiv link available
  if (!is.na(pub.df$arxiv[each])){
    cat(paste0("[{{< ai arxiv-square title=\"arXiv\" >}}](", pub.df$arxiv[each],")",
             "{style=\"font-size:1.5em\"}  "))
  }
  
  #if url link available
  if (!is.na(pub.df$url[each])){
    cat(paste0("[{{< fa globe title=\"Other Sources\" >}}](", pub.df$url[each],")",
             "{style=\"font-size:1.5em\"}  "))
  }
  
  
  cat(paste0("\n", "::: \n")) #close g-col-10-1

  #dimensions and altmetrics
  cat(paste0("::: {.g-col-2 .vh-start }\n", #g-col-2-1
             "<span class=\"__dimensions_badge_embed__\" data-doi=\"",
             doi.list[doi.ind],
             "\"  data-style=\"small_circle\"></span> \n",
             "<div class='altmetric-embed' data-badge-popover='left' data-badge-type='donut' data-doi='",
             doi.list[doi.ind], "'></div> \n", 
             "::: \n", #close g-col-2-1
             "::: \n"))  #close grid-1
  
  if (doi.list[doi.ind]=="10.1038/s41598-020-66563-z") {
    #sci rep paper
    cat(paste0("::: grid \n", #grid-2
               "::: {.g-col-10 .vh-left .just-text} \n", #g-col-10-2
               "> Nature Scientific Reports [Top 50](https://www.nature.com/collections/feidhcahdd) most downloaded paper in 2020 \n",
               "::: \n", #close g-col-10-2
               "::: {.g-col-2 .vh-start }\n", #g-col-2-2
               "::: icon \n", #icon
               "![](../images/scireptop100.png){.lightbox} \n",
               "::: \n", #close icon
               "::: \n",#close g-col-2-2
               "::: \n")) #close grid-2 
  } 
  if (doi.list[doi.ind]=="10.1016/j.buildenv.2021.107928"){
    cat(paste0("::: grid \n", #grid-2
               "::: {.g-col-10 .vh-left .just-text} \n", #g-col-10-2
               "> [Invitation-based special initiative paper](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.buildenv.2015.08.012) \n",
               "::: \n", #close g-col-10-2 
               "::: \n")) #close grid-2 
  }
  
  
  cat("\n<p><br></p>\n")
}

```


## Full Publication List


```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)

cat("### Journal Articles \n<br>")

#articles only
art.df<-pub.df %>%
  filter(type=="Article")

for (each in 1:nrow(art.df)) {
  cat(paste0(art.df$authors[each],",
             \"",art.df$title[each],"\", *",
             art.df$journalShort[each],"*, ",
             art.df$year[each], ". \n<br> Find it here: ",
             "[{{< ai doi-square title=\"DOI\" >}}](https://doi.org/",art.df$doi[each],")",
             "{style=\"font-size:1.5em\"}  "))
  
  #if RG link available
  if (!is.na(art.df$rg[each])){
    cat(paste0("[{{< ai researchgate-square title=\"ResearchGate\" >}}](", art.df$rg[each],")",
             "{style=\"font-size:1.5em\"}  "))
  }
  
  #if arxiv link available
  if (!is.na(art.df$arxiv[each])){
    cat(paste0("[{{< ai arxiv-square title=\"arXiv\" >}}](", art.df$arxiv[each],")",
             "{style=\"font-size:1.5em\"}  "))
  }
  
  #if url link available
  if (!is.na(art.df$url[each])){
    cat(paste0("[{{< fa globe title=\"Other Sources\" >}}](", art.df$url[each],")",
             "{style=\"font-size:1.5em\"}  "))
  }
  
  cat("\n<br><br>\n")
}
```

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

cat("### Conference proceedings \n<br>")

#conferences only
conf.df<-pub.df %>%
  filter(type=="Proceedings Paper")

for (each in 1:nrow(conf.df)) {
  cat(paste0(conf.df$authors[each],",

}
```
